page.title: 12Chelsfield Village Players
page.content: On Friday Mrs. Blatcher came to talk to us about the {Chelsfield Village Players.}They have had that name for 50 years next summer so it is nearly their half centinary.The Chelsfield Players are a group of people who put on plays together in the Village Hall.The group was formed in Chelsfield but not in the old Chelsfield Village as they first started to present plays in Chelsfield Park Estate.People in that area decided to perform plays and the group was formed in 1936. Mrs Blatcher made a model of Queen Victoria for one of their plays, the model was made from clay.Mrs. Blatcher chooses the cast for the plays.The last play Mrs. Blatcher did was called {Murder In Company.}
